passage_text: Emmy Rossum looked cozy with her writer and director boyfriend Sam Esmail at a party for Carbon38 founder Katie Warner Johnson Saturday night at Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss ’ Hollywood Hills home to celebrate the e-commerce site’s second anniversary. “Emmy and Sam looked extremely happy in love,” says a witness.

Emmy Rossum is opening up about her 2010 divorce from music executive Justin Siegel after a year-and-a-half of marriage. “Everyone messes up in relationships and has peaks and valleys in their personal lives, Rossum said in the latest issue of InStyle Hair.

Emmy Rossum and Justin Seigel began dating in 2007 and wed in secrecy in February 2008. After a mere year and a half of secretly being married, Emmy Rossum's husband, music executive Justin Siegel, has filed for divorce from the 23-year-old actress citing irreconcilable differences.

Justin Siegel: Emmy Rossum's Boyfriend. Emmy Rossum and music business boyfriend Justin Siegel hold hands on the way to the parking garage after a lunch date at Beverly Hills hangout Kate Mantilini on Tuesday.

Justin Campbell/BuzzFoto. By Ken Lee. Emmy Rossum's husband, music executive Justin Siegel, has filed for divorce after a year-and-a-half marriage. Siegel cites irreconcilable differences and seeks spousal support from Rossum, 23, according to the Sept. 25 filing in Los Angeles Superior Court. The couple had no children.
